SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatx1005.model.validators

Class ArgumentValidator

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatx1005.model.validators.ArgumentValidator
public class ArgumentValidator extends Object

Argument Validator

A utility class for validating arguments passed to constructors and methods. The class has a private constructor to prevent instantiation.

Since:
V0.1.0
Author:
William Holtsdalen

  • Constructor Summary

    Prevents instantiation of the ArgumentValidator class.
